utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! Hi Ben!

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi, we have a little bathroom emergency.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, yeah go ahead.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, before we do uh, are any of Joey’s special romance magazines in there?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No. No.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay! All clear!

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Thanks Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ben, its Rachel! But whatever.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Everything okay in there?

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Don’t talk to me now!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Awww, just like his daddy.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey listen can you do me a big favor? The dean’s office just called and said there was an urgent meeting. Can you watch Ben for like an hour?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What-what about Monica?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, she isn’t home.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So it would just be, me alone?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, Ben would be there.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Huh umm…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What’s the matter?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well that—y’know it’s just uh, I’ve never done that before. Me and him alone.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rach, he’s not an ex-con.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Okay. Okay. Uh, what do I, what do I do with him?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don’t know! Just-just talk to him-entertain him and keep him alive.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. Ben? Come here. All right, I’m gonna leave you here with Aunt Rachel for about an hour. Okay? Are you gonna be okay?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah I think so.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I wasn’t talking to you.

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: I’ll be okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, I’ll see you soon buddy. Be back in an hour.

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Bye dad.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Bye. Ahhh… So this is fun, huh?

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Not really.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Uh, want something-want something to drink?

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh great! How do you feel about Diet Coke?

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: I’m not allowed to have soda.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Well that’s pretty much all that we have—Oh! Oh! Have you ever had a virgin margarita?

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: What’s a virgin?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Water it is.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What about the second minister we meet with? I kinda liked him.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You mean the spitter?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Come on! It wasn’t that bad!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Easy for you to say; you’ll be wearing a veil.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, what about the third guy?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You mean the guy who kept staring at your chest?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Can you blame him?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sorry, I just don’t like the idea of when I say, "I do," he’s thinking, "Yeah, I’d do her too!"

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well then we still have a problem.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: With what?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, we’re trying to find someone to perform our wedding and they’re all either boring or annoying or y’know, can’t stop staring at the ladies.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oo! You should have one of us do it!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, we’re getting married, married; not sixth grade married.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No! No! It’s-it’s uh a real thing! Anyone can get ordained on the Internet and perform like weddings and stuff!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you serious?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes! A friend of mine did it and it’s totally legal!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I call it!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?! No! It was my idea!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Guys thank you very much but neither of you is marrying us.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Does calling it not mean anything anymore?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We are going to have a legitimate member of the clergy! And when I say legitimate I mean, gay and in control of his saliva!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ben y’know when uh, when you were a baby, you and I used to hang out all the time. ‘Cause I was, I was your daddy’s girlfriend.

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: But you’re not anymore!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, I’m not.

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: ‘Cause you guys were on a break.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! We were not on a—Okay. That’s fine! Fine. Y’know what Ben? One day when you are a lot older I am going to tell you that entire story over a pitcher of real margaritas, okay?

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: When’s my daddy coming back?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Fifty-two minutes. So no-no brothers and sisters, huh? That must be nice. You don’t have to share stuff.

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Sharing is good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, you’re one of those. But y’know what? I have two sisters of my own and we just-just tortured each other.

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Really? Like how?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well y’know, we would umm, repeat everything the other said, or uh, we’d jump out of closets to scare each other, or switch the sugar for the salt so they’d put salt on their cereal.

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: That’s a good one.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah? You like that one?

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Yeah, you’re funny.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m funny? Oh thank God! Well hey, I’ve got a ton of these! Umm, oh hear—Do you want a good one? Here’s a good one. Umm, you uh, you take a quarter, take a quarter and, and you blacken the edge. Right? And then you say to person, I bet you can’t roll this quarter from your forehead to your chin without it leaving your face. And then when they do it, they’re left with a big black pencil line right down the center of their face.

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Can I do it to you?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I-I-I-I’m funny Ben, but I’m not stupid. Okay?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So, did you uh, find anyone to marry you guys yet?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, but Horny for Monica Minister called, wanting to know if we were still together.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We’re never gonna find anybody.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well then let me do it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joe…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no-no! Look, I’ve been thinking about it. I’m an actor right? So I won’t get nervous talking in front of people.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey look it’s really sweet…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no-no-no look no! I won’t spit, and I won’t stare at Monica’s breasts! Y’know? Everyone knows I’m an ass man!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That is true.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah and the most important thing is that it won’t be some like, stranger up there who barely knows you. It’ll be me! And I swear I’ll do a really good job. Plus, y’know I love you guys and-and it would really mean a lot to me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know, we haven’t found anybody else.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It might be kinda cool.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So I can do it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah you can do it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right!!! Okay!! All right! Okay-okay, I gotta get started on my speech! Oh, wait a minute, Internet ministers can still have sex right?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Pheebs, how’s it going?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I have a headache. A horrible headache!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I’m sorry. Can I get you something?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God, you’ve got to stop chattering!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Here, take a couple of these.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What is it?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s Hexadrin.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no, I don’t believe in Western medicine. No, if you just apply pressure to these points right here. Then your hand starts to hurt and you still have a headache, so thanks.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, while we’re waiting for these pills to kick in, I’m gonna sit you down on the couch. Come on. Get some nice soft pillows under your head, I’m gonna turn the TV on and you can watch whatever you want. And I’m—Sit down——gonna make you some tea. And then, I’m gonna rub your feet.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh! My head! Oh! Oh!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Coming.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I have a bone to pick with you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh-oh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes! Ben learned a little trick.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah? Did he pull the old…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That’s right! That’s right! Saran Wrap on the toilet seat so the pee goes everywhere!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah that! You know I hate practical jokes! They’re mean and they’re stupid and-and I don’t want my son learning them!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, come on! Saran Wrap on the toilet seat, you don’t think that’s just a little funny?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I was barefoot. Now tell me, the toilet thing is the only thing you taught him right?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It’s amazing! My headache is completely gone! What are those pills called?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hexadrin.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I love you Hexadrin! Oh look! It comes with a story!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No Phoebe, those are like the side affects and stuff.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Say what?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y’know, the possible side affects.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God! Dizziness, nervousness, drowsiness, facial swelling, nausea, headache—Headache. Vomiting, stomach bleeding, liver damage! Now okay, I don’t recall any of this coming up when you gave me these little death capsules! Oh I’m sorry, extra strength death capsules!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, relax none of that stuff ever happens! They just put it on there for legal reasons!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: In case it happens.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Say hello to Reverend Joey Tribbiani!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You did it! You got ordained?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I just got off the Internet! Man, there is a lot of porn out there!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Our minister…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I have liver damage. Ow! Oh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, your liver is right here.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, then I must be disoriented.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Anyway, I started working on what I’m going to say for the ceremony, do you wanna hear it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Now-now, listen this is just a first draft so… "We are gathered here today on this joyous occasion to celebrate the special love that Monica and Chandler share." Eh? "It is a love based on giving and receiving. As well as having and sharing. And the love that they give and have is shared and received. And through this having and giving and sharing and receiving." "We too can share and love and have and receive."

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Should we call the spitter?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: What a nice surprise! What are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well y’know I was just in the neighborhood and I passed by your building and I thought to myself, "What’s up with Carol and sweet, little Ben?"

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Can I ask what—Come on in.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Umm uh, I’ll make some coffee and we can uh, chat.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’d love that. I would loooove… So uh, so where is sweet little Ben? I would love to have a little...

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Gotcha!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I found him! Very funny, come here! That is exactly why I’ve come here to talk to you okay?

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Rach, do you want some sugar in your coffee?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes oh——Do I want sugar in my coffee? No, just some milk would be good Carol. Thanks. Okay, do you remember all that stuff I taught you yesterday?

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Remember all that stuff I taught you yesterday?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Don’t do that.

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Don’t do that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Seriously, your dad doesn’t like pranks.

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Seriously, your dad doesn’t like pranks.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh damnit!

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Oh damnit!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! Don’t say that! Don’t say that!

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Damnit!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No don’t! Go back to repeating!

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Damnit!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh crap!

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Oh crap!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I feel like my face is swelling. Is my face swelling?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, your face is fine! Come on, none of this stuff is going to happen to you! Stop being such a baby!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, interesting you should call me that! Now that I may never have one!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay you guys, I got a little more written. Are you ready?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah. O-okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: "When I think of the love that these two givers and receivers share, I can not help but envy the lifetime ahead of having and loving and giving and…" And then I can’t think of a good word for right here.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How about receiving?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: See Joe, not that that’s not grrreat! But, one of the cool things about having somebody we know perform the ceremony is that it can be about us! Y’know, it can be more personal. You can tell stories about us!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooh, like the time you and I went to Atlantic City and I made you laugh so hard you threw up your whole steak?! Remember?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, not us… Us!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I gotcha. Sorry. So, did you ever make him throw up a whole anything?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Did you ever feed him a poison capsule that made him bleed from the eyes?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It doesn’t say that!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! Suddenly somebody knows all about the side affects!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: See Joe, we want you to tell stories but y’know, romantic stories. Nice stories.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh. Okay. Ooh! Ooh! Okay, maybe I’ll talk about London! Y’know when you two hooked up! Only, only I won’t say hooked up. I’ll say, "Began their beautiful journey…"

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: There you go!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: "…by doin’ it."

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joe?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. All right. Umm, so uh, so how did it happen? Did your eyes meet across the room? And then the next thing y’know you’re in the bathtub together and she’s feeding you strawberries?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Isn’t that what happened with you and the bride’s maid?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah!! I call that London style.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No that is not what happened with us. Well, I was umm, I was really sad that night because this guy that I was Ross’s mom.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And then Chandler was, was really sweet and he consoled me. And well we drank too much…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah baby!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And I was a perfect gentleman and I walked her to her hotel room and said goodnight.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But then later that night…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah baby!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Cute PJ’s! You’re really livin’ it up here in London huh?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well I was… I was exactly expecting company after… 9:15.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Is Joey here?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, last time I saw him he was heading out the door with the bride’s maid and a bucket of strawberries. So uh, you’re not still upset about what that guy told ya are ya?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wouldn’t you be?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, look it’s been a really emotional time y’know, and you’ve had a lot to drink. And you’ve just got to let that go okay? I mean you were the most beautiful in the room tonight!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You kidding? You’re the most beautiful woman in most rooms… Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! What’s going on? You and I just made out! You and I are making out?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, not anymore.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But we don’t do that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know, I just thought it would be fun.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How drunk are you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Drunk enough to know that I want to do this. Not so drunk that you should feel guilty about taking advantage.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That’s the perfect amount!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y’know what’s weird?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This doesn’t feel weird!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You’re a really good kisser.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I have kissed over four women. Do you wanna get under the covers?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hm-hmm!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow! You are really fast!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It bodes well for me that speed impresses you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We’re gonna see each other naked.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yep!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Do you wanna do it at the same time?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Count of three?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: One!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Two!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Two!

utterance.speaker: Monica and Chandler
utterance.content: Three!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well I think it’s safe to say that our friendship is effectively ruined.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Eh, we weren’t that close anyway!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Eh!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joey! Joey! Joey! J-J-Joey-Joey-J-Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey Joe! I was just watching a movie-e-e…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, dude I’m so sorry!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No! No! No!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey no-no-no-no! It’s cool! It’s cool! I-I’ll only be a second, I’m still with my bride’s maid, I just—Where are those condoms you brought?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: They’re in my bag over there.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh, could you leave me one?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: For just you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey listen, why don’t you come downstairs with me? There’s some really nice girls down there.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No I-I-I’m fine.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, here you go buddy. Go nuts.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s what that was?! ‘Cause that other thing? I thought you were on to something, but it did nothing for me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, can we change the topic? Because it’s really doing nothing for me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh… Can you imagine if I hadn’t left you that last one? You two might’ve never gotten together. Ooh-ooh! Could you imagine if I sent that hooker up to the room like I was gonna?! It’s like it was in the stars!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, it’s totally meant to be. Tell him who you originally wanted to hook up with that night.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Who did you originally want to hook up with?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, fine but please don’t be upset! Okay? I was really depressed okay? And really drunk! I just wanted something stupid and meaningless. I just wanted…just sex. So, when I…went to your room that night…I was actually looking…for Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah baby! No baby!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So you came to the room looking for Joey? Did you ever in-intend on telling me about this?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No because it-it didn’t seem important.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, it’s not important? It’s not important?! If it wasn’t for a bride’s maid you’d be marrying him not me!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Noo!! The point is that is was you that was there that night! It is you that I am marrying! It is you that I feel in love with!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And it is a love that is based on having and giving and receiv—

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don’t believe it. The most romantic night of my life and I’m runner up.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, please! Do you know how unbelievably glad I am that Joey was not there that night?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Now I’m a man of the cloth, but I still have feelings!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look there is no way you’re doing this wedding now. Okay?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?! That’s not fair! It’s not my fault! I was off with my bride’s maid! And who’s to say I would’ve even said yes?! I mean I would’ve said yes. Chandler look y-y-you are making way to big a deal out of this, all right? Look, everything worked out okay!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, it’s just weird! Okay? I don’t want to be standing their saying my vows and then having the mental image of you and Monica! I-I-I need…I don’t know what I need. I need a walk.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait Chandler come on, let’s—it’s not a big deal!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It is to me. You wanted to sleep with Batman, and instead you had to settle for Robin.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: This is crazy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know! Robin is so gay!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So now what have we agreed?

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: No more pranks.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And-and what else?

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: That you and daddy were not on a break.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Very good.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rachel! What are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m just visiting my good friend Carol.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Your good friend?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What’s her last name?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Carol…Lesbian?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nice. And by the way that uh, that line down my face?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What line?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wh-wh-what line? The line that prompted a student in my last class of the day to say uh, "Dude, don’t you ever was your face?"

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, I’m sorry. I’m sorry I didn’t tell you but you were so mad already!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Of course I was mad! I told you I-I hate this stuff! Okay? It-it’s not funny!

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Hey Ross!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: What’s not funny?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Practical jokes.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Oh I…I think they’re funny.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You have a line down your face.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, maybe they are not funny to you…

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Or Carol! But they’re funny to kids and who is it hurting?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, y’know what? I’ll tell you who it hurts! It hurts the kid who has all his clothes stolen in gym class so he has to go to the principal’s office wearing nothing but a catcher’s mitt!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That was you?! We heard about you in Junior High! Did you really just shake your fist in the air and shout, "I will be revenged?!"

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I will be! Listen, I don’t want you teaching my son that stuff anymore. Okay?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Fine. Fine, but I’ll have you know that once I taught him that stuff he called me Fun Aunt Rachel. And I loved being Fun Aunt Rachel but I’ll go back to being Boring and Uncomfortable Aunt Rachel if that’s what you want!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No that’s not what I want. Uh, I’m glad you guys were bonding but I…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Look he doesn’t have any brothers or sisters, somebody’s gonna have to teach him this stuff! And I haven’t taught him anything that a normal 6-year-old doesn’t know anyway!

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Crap!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I gotta go!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey. Do you want this scone? It came for me but it would probably rather sleep with you!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Chandler, come on nothing even happened!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look Joe, I know you wanted to do the wedding…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-hey-no! If you don’t want me to do it, I except that. I don’t care about that. I just…I don’t want you to be upset.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How can I not be upset? Okay? I finally fall in love with this fantastic woman and it turns out that she wanted you first!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah for like a half an hour one night! Chandler, she wants you for the rest of her life! You’re so lucky! Look what I missed out on by not being there! Although you know what? It could never have worked like you guys did, ‘cause you guys are perfect for each other. Y’know, we look at you and-and we see you together and it just…it-it fits. Y’know? And you just know it’s gonna last forever.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That’s what you should say.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: When you’re marrying us; that’s what you should say.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really? I can do it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’d love it if you would do it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But those are the words! Those exact words!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well I don’t know remember exactly but, it’s-it’s pretty much about having and giving and sharing and receiving.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey I’m sorry to do this to you again but uh, is there any way you can look after Ben for a little bit? I-I’ve got this meeting at school. And-and he-he asked for his uh, ‘Fun Aunt’ Rachel, so…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohhh! Well of course I will watch him! We have fun, don’t we Ben?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, I’ll see you later pal.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, okay. Wh—Ah-ha! Wait a minute. Uh Ben, I can’t do it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I can’t let him go out that way, he’s got a meeting. You’ve got something here on your back.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? That’s great. That is great. What did we just finish talking about Ben?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh I…

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: What did we just finish talking about Ben?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right, that’s it! Come—you—no! You are in big trouble young man!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! Wait! Come on!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wait! No! Ben, come here! I am not kidding!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No you guys…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I-I-am—

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: EHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!! My God!!!!!!!!!!! Oh my God!!!!!!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey-hey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So are guys doing okay?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, we talked and Monica made me see that I over reacted a little bit and some things in life are more important.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah baby!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m really glad you guys are okay but, I just keep thinking what would happen if-if you two actually had hooked up.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Honey! Dinner’s ready!

utterance.speaker: Fat Joey
utterance.content: What’s my little chef got for me tonight?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Your favorite!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ho-ho-ho, fried stuff with cheese!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yep! And lot’s of it!

utterance.speaker: Fat Joey
utterance.content: Thanks sweetheart. Give me a little sugar here. Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, in we go.

utterance.speaker: Fat Joey
utterance.content: Here we go! Here we go! Here we go! How you doin’?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Here you go.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God! This is a six-hour pill! That’s it! I’m out of the woods! Ohh! What a relief!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Good for you!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, it’s like huge weight has been lifted! ‘Cause look, no hair loss, not a rash, no hives, I’m just so happy! Because no shortness of breath, no temporary euphoria—Oh.
